overall.description: Returns True if two arrays are element-wise equal within a tolerance.

masked_equal.description: Whether masked values in a and b are considered equal (True) or not (False). They are considered equal by default.

rtol.description: Relative tolerance. The relative difference is equal to rtol * b. Default is 1e-5.

atol.description: Absolute tolerance. The absolute difference is equal to atol. Default is 1e-8.

y.description: Returns True if the two arrays are equal within the given tolerance, False otherwise. If either array contains NaN, then False is returned.
